signature: TransformedCollection<E> transformedCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)

direct_enhancements.method_name: transformingCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create a transformed collection using a transformer, but transformedCollection also transforms existing elements in the collection.
Both methods involve transforming elements within a collection, sharing similar control flow and exception handling.
The add method relies on the transform method, which is closely related to the transformedCollection method in terms of functionality and data transformation.
The addAll method also relies on the transform method, making it functionally dependent on the transformedCollection method.
Both methods involve transforming individual elements, sharing similar control flow and exception handling.
